title: Boy Made of Dawn
description: MP3 CD Format In this fast-paced sequel to the highly acclaimed Navajo Autumn , Charlie Yazzie and Thomas Begay encounter danger and intrigue on the nation's largest Indian reservation. Old and new characters emerge to unravel ongoing corruption in the upcoming Patsy Greyhorse murder trials, and an irascible Ute family and their shrewd ranch-woman neighbor become caught up in the plot to place certain tribal leaders above the law.
author: R. Allen Chappell
